page.title: 13THE CHURCH & THE COMMUNITY
page.content:
Clifton Hampden is part of a Team Ministry in which a single full time vicar is shared by the parishes of Clifton Hampden, Culham, Little Wittenham and Long Wittenham. Each parish has its own officers who do a great deal of the day to day running of the parish. Although only a small proportion of the population are regular attenders the Church continues to be a focal point for many village activities. For example the summer Village Festival Weekend was organised in aid of the Church Restoration Fund.
Each month the four parishes jointly publish a magazine which contains reports of all local activities as well as matters more directly relating to the churches.
